title: Lazy Lightning
description: A vagrant is arrested and taken to a ranch where he befriends a young boy in a wheelchair and uncovers a plot by the boy's uncle.

title: The Stolen Ranch
description: Two World War I veterans try to reclaim a ranch that was stolen from one of them while he was suffering from shell shock.

title: Blazing Days
description: A cowboy is robbed by a bandit disguised as a dude and sets out to find the culprit and clear his name.

title: Hard Fists
description: An army officer plans to commit suicide to avoid a court martial but is saved by a cowboy who teaches him courage.

title: The Border Cavalier
description: A ranch foreman fights against crooked land speculators who are trying to swindle his boss out of a valuable property.

title: Desert Dust
description: A young man must prove his worth to the daughter of a state senator while dealing with an escaped convict.

title: Straight Shootin'
description: A cowboy comes to the aid of a rancher and his daughter who are being threatened by a gang of cattle rustlers.

title: Thunder Riders
description: An eastern girl inherits a ranch and travels west, where her guardian arranges a fake Indian attack to test her courage, but a real villain intervenes.

title: Anyone Here Seen Kelly?
description: A French girl follows an American soldier she met during the war back to New York City, only to find he has forgotten her.

title: The Shakedown
description: A professional boxer who throws fights for money redeems himself after he falls for a waitress and rescues an orphan.

title: The Love Trap
description: A chorus girl marries a wealthy man but faces disapproval from his family and blackmail from a man in her past.

title: Hell's Heroes
description: Three outlaws fleeing through the desert find a dying woman and her newborn baby, and promise to carry the child to safety.

title: The Storm
description: Two men are stranded in a cabin during a blizzard with a young woman, leading to tension and conflict.

title: A House Divided
description: A fisherman and his son clash over the father's new young mail-order bride.

title: Tom Brown of Culver
description: A young man whose father was a hero killed in World War I is given a scholarship to Culver Military Academy, but faces a crisis when his father turns up alive.

title: Her First Mate
description: A candy butcher on a ferry boat dreams of sailing the high seas but his wife buys him a ferry instead.

title: Counsellor at Law
description: A successful Jewish lawyer who worked his way up from the slums faces a crisis that threatens to destroy his career and personal life.

title: Glamour
description: An ambitious chorus girl marries a successful composer but finds herself torn between her career and family.

title: The Good Fairy
description: A naive movie usherette tries to do a good deed for a waiter, leading to a series of complications involving a wealthy meatpacker and a poor lawyer.

title: The Gay Deception
description: A secretary wins a lottery and splurges on a stay at a luxury hotel where she meets a bellboy who is actually a prince in disguise.

title: These Three
description: Two women run a school for girls and are ruined by a malicious student's lies about a love triangle involving a local doctor.

title: Dodsworth
description: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a European vacation that reveals the emptiness of their marriage.

title: Come and Get It
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A ruthlessly ambitious lumber tycoon abandons the woman he loves for money and power, only to fall for her daughter years later.

title: Dead End
description: The lives of the rich and poor intersect in a New York City neighborhood where a notorious gangster returns home.

title: Jezebel
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A headstrong Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, and tries to win him back.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A servant falls in love with his master's daughter, but social class barriers drive them apart with tragic consequences.

title: The Westerner
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A drifter is framed for horse theft by Judge Roy Bean and tries to clear his name while caught in a range war.

title: The Letter
description: A woman claims she killed a man in self-defense, but a letter in her own hand reveals the truth.

title: The Little Foxes
description: The ruthless, money-hungry Hubbard clan lives in the deep South at the turn of the century and will stop at nothing to gain wealth and power.

title: Mrs. Miniver
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

title: The Heiress
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A plain young woman falls in love with a handsome man, but her domineering father suspects the man is a fortune hunter.

title: Detective Story
description: A bitter cop is determined to bring down an abortionist, but his own wife has a dark secret related to the man.

title: Carrie
description: A married man falls for a younger woman, leading to his social and financial ruin.

title: Roman Holiday
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: The Desperate Hours
description: Three escaped convicts take a suburban family hostage.

title: Friendly Persuasion
description: A Quaker family's pacifist beliefs are tested during the American Civil War.

title: The Big Country
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A New England sea captain arrives in the Old West to marry his fiancée and becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over water rights.

title: Ben-Hur
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, but regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: The Children's Hour
description: Two women who run a private school for girls are ruined when a malicious student spreads a lie that they are in a lesbian relationship.

title: The Collector
description: A socially awkward young man kidnaps a beautiful art student and holds her captive in his cellar, hoping she will fall in love with him.

title: How to Steal a Million
description: A woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries gets help from an expert thief.

title: Funny Girl
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: The life of Fanny Brice, from her early days in the Jewish slums of the Lower East Side, to the height of her career with the Ziegfeld Follies, including her marriage to and eventual divorce from Nick Arnstein.

title: The Liberation of L.B. Jones
description: A wealthy black undertaker in a racially divided Southern town wants a divorce from his wife, who is having an affair with a white policeman, leading to violent consequences.
